boolean.description: The property specified as a boolean value.

boundingRectangle.description: The property specified as `[X, Y, Width, Height]`.

cartesian.description: The property specified as a three-dimensional Cartesian value `[X, Y, Z]`.

cartesian2.description: The property specified as a two-dimensional Cartesian value `[X, Y]`.

unitCartesian.description: The property specified as a three-dimensional unit magnitude Cartesian value `[X, Y, Z]`.

spherical.description: The property specified as a spherical value `[Clock, Cone, Magnitude]`.  The clock angle is measured in the XY plane from the positive X axis toward the positive Y axis.  The cone angle is the angle from the positive Z axis toward the negative Z axis.

unitSpherical.description: The property specified as a unit spherical value `[Clock, Cone]`.  The clock angle is measured in the XY plane from the positive X axis toward the positive Y axis.  The cone angle is the angle from the positive Z axis toward the negative Z axis.

reference.description: The property specified as a reference to another property.
